channel.title: LeWeb3 on Argolon Solutions
channel.description: Recent content in LeWeb3 on Argolon Solutions

item.title: Suggestion for FON
item.description: Given the lack of free wireless at FoWA and the disastrous wireless at LeWeb3, it struck me yesterday that conferences are the ideal opportunity for FON to give people real hands-on experience of their routers. Imagine if the guys had provided all the wifi for free yesterday? They could still use the logon screens so they get the branding opportunities but it would have been such a coup! Maybe an idea for some of the upcoming European conferences?
